name: PKS Control Plane VM
description: This dashboard displays metrics from hosts where Telegraf is being used for system metric collection with Wavefront's output plugin.

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: 100-(avg(rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode=idle AND not cpu)))*100)

sources.name: Total
sources.query: 100-(avg(rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode=idle AND not cpu)))*100)

sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode!=idle AND not cpu))*100

charts.name: Load scaled by number of CPUs

sources.name: Idle
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode=idle AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: Nice
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode=nice AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: Soft IRQ
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode="softirq" AND not cpu))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode="steal" AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: System
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode="system" AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: User
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode="user" AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: Wait
sources.query: rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode="iowait" AND not cpu))*100

sources.name: usage
sources.query: 100-(avg(rate(ts("node.cpu.seconds.total.counter", source="${host}" AND mode=idle AND not cpu)))*100)

charts.name: Disk Free vs. Disk Used (Overall) Trend

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent: This dashboard shows detailed system metrics for **${host}**. Use the dropdown menu at the top to select a different host. To add a new host, install an agent on the host using a [host integration](/integrations) for your operating system.
